definition: mostly white aquatic bird having long pointed wings and short legs, fool or hoax
details:
noun
- mostly white aquatic bird having long pointed wings and short legs
= synonyms: seagull, sea gull
- a person who is gullible and easy to take advantage of
= synonyms: mark
verb
- fool or hoax
= synonyms: cod, put on, slang, fool, dupe, take in, befool, put one over, put one across
- make a fool or dupe of
= synonyms: befool
